Comment: I live in Sweden and we have pretty high amount of child birth. They key things you get are.    Every month you get 100 dollar per kid(in our currency ofcourse)  2 kids gives you 230 (multiple child bonus, this is tax free money that does move you up in income bracket).    Free healthcare. Free kindergarten, Free school up to university. Student loan at the national borrowing level to cover cost of living during studies.    Almost 2 years of payed parental leave per child. 3 months that is looked to the father to force the fathers to take care of child. Usually taken the last months before child starts in kindergarden. First 10 days after child is born both parents are off from work because it is such hard time. Can be extended to a month by cutting off two weeks at the end of period.
